description:
Amarok 3.1 open-source music player is now available for download with a refreshed Last.fm plugin, Last.fm Similar Artists context applet, and more. Here's what's new!

The post Amarok 3.1 Released with Updated Last.fm Plugin, Last.fm Similar Artists Applet appeared first on 9to5Linux - do not reproduce this article without permission. This RSS feed is intended for readers, not scrapers.
title: Amarok 3.1 Released with Updated Last.fm Plugin, Last.fm Similar Artists Applet
